description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a login screen that allows users to enter their phone number and request an OTP for authentication. It manages user input, handles navigation upon successful OTP request, and interacts with an authentication provider for state management.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a user interface for entering a phone number and requesting an OTP for login.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: The state class for LoginScreen, managing user input, error state, and interactions with the AuthProvider.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the TextEditingController when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _requestOtp
methods.description: Handles the logic to request an OTP based on the entered phone number, updates error messages, navigates to OTP screen upon success.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen, including input fields, feedback messages, and buttons.
